FROM "monthly_values"
WHERE "tag" IN (
    'à¸™à¹‰à¸³à¹ƒà¸Šà¹‰à¸­à¸²à¸„à¸²à¸£ 1',
    'à¸™à¹‰à¸³à¸”à¸·à¹ˆà¸¡',
    'à¸™à¹‰à¸³à¸šà¸³à¸šà¸±à¸”à¸à¸¥à¸±à¸šà¸¡à¸²à¹ƒà¸Šà¹‰à¹ƒà¸«à¸¡à¹ˆ',
    'à¸™à¹‰à¸³à¹ƒà¸Šà¹‰à¸­à¸²à¸„à¸²à¸£ 2',

SET GLOBAL
Select Tag
W
SET GLOBAL
Select Tag
func:
msg.query = `
SELECT 
  bwm.air_cooling_water_building2,
  bwm.water_usage_building2,
  bwm.reused_treated_water,
  bwm.drinking_water,
  bwm.air_cooling_water_building1,
  bwm.water_usage_building1,

  wm.water_in,
  wm.water_out,

  pm.treatment_pond,
  pm.wastewater_pump_building1,
  pm.wastewater_pump_building2,

  bwm.recorded_at::date AS recorded_date

FROM public.building_water_meters bwm
LEFT JOIN public.water_meters wm
  ON wm.recorded_at::date = bwm.recorded_at::date
LEFT JOIN public.power_meters pm
  ON pm.recorded_at::date = bwm.recorded_at::date

WHERE bwm.recorded_at::date = CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '1 day';


`;
return msg;

name: PY
func:
msg.query = ` WITH calc AS (
  SELECT
    CASE
      WHEN LAG(treatment_pond) OVER (ORDER BY recorded_at) IS NULL THEN 0
      WHEN treatment_pond >= LAG(treatment_pond) OVER (ORDER BY recorded_at)
        THEN treatment_pond - LAG(treatment_pond) OVER (ORDER BY recorded_at)
      ELSE treatment_pond + LAG(treatment_pond) OVER (ORDER BY recorded_at)
    END AS treatment_pond_calc,

    CASE
      WHEN LAG(wastewater_pump_building1) OVER (ORDER BY recorded_at) IS NULL THEN 0
      WHEN wastewater_pump_building1 >= LAG(wastewater_pump_building1) OVER (ORDER BY recorded_at)
        THEN wastewater_pump_building1 - LAG(wastewater_pump_building1) OVER (ORDER BY recorded_at)
      ELSE wastewater_pump_building1 + LAG(wastewater_pump_building1) OVER (ORDER BY recorded_at)
    END AS wastewater_pump_building1_calc,

    CASE
      WHEN LAG(wastewater_pump_building2) OVER (ORDER BY recorded_at) IS NULL THEN 0
      WHEN wastewater_pump_building2 >= LAG(wastewater_pump_building2) OVER (ORDER BY recorded_at)
        THEN wastewater_pump_building2 - LAG(wastewater_pump_building2) OVER (ORDER BY recorded_at)
      ELSE wastewater_pump_building2 + LAG(wastewater_pump_building2) OVER (ORDER BY recorded_at)
    END AS wastewater_pump_building2_calc

  FROM power_meters
  WHERE recorded_at >= date_trunc('year', CURRENT_DATE)
    AND recorded_at < (date_trunc('year', CURRENT_DATE) + INTERVAL '1 year')
)

SELECT
  SUM(treatment_pond_calc + wastewater_pump_building1_calc + wastewater_pump_building2_calc) AS total_sum_poweryear
FROM calc;
`;
return msg;

name: PD
func:
msg.query = `
WITH calc AS ( 
  SELECT
    CASE
      WHEN LAG(treatment_pond) OVER (ORDER BY recorded_at) IS NULL THEN 0
      WHEN treatment_pond >= LAG(treatment_pond) OVER (ORDER BY recorded_at)
        THEN treatment_pond - LAG(treatment_pond) OVER (ORDER BY recorded_at)
      ELSE treatment_pond + LAG(treatment_pond) OVER (ORDER BY recorded_at)
    END AS treatment_pond_calc,
    
    CASE
      WHEN LAG(wastewater_pump_building1) OVER (ORDER BY recorded_at) IS NULL THEN 0
      WHEN wastewater_pump_building1 >= LAG(wastewater_pump_building1) OVER (ORDER BY recorded_at)
        THEN wastewater_pump_building1 - LAG(wastewater_pump_building1) OVER (ORDER BY recorded_at)
      ELSE wastewater_pump_building1 + LAG(wastewater_pump_building1) OVER (ORDER BY recorded_at)
    END AS wastewater_pump_building1_calc,
    
    CASE
      WHEN LAG(wastewater_pump_building2) OVER (ORDER BY recorded_at) IS NULL THEN 0
      WHEN wastewater_pump_building2 >= LAG(wastewater_pump_building2) OVER (ORDER BY recorded_at)
        THEN wastewater_pump_building2 - LAG(wastewater_pump_building2) OVER (ORDER BY recorded_at)
      ELSE wastewater_pump_building2 + LAG(wastewater_pump_building2) OVER (ORDER BY recorded_at)
    END AS wastewater_pump_building2_calc

  FROM power_meters
  WHERE recorded_at >= date_trunc('month', CURRENT_DATE)
    AND recorded_at < (date_trunc('month', CURRENT_DATE) + INTERVAL '1 month')
)

SELECT
  SUM(treatment_pond_calc + wastewater_pump_building1_calc + wastewater_pump_building2_calc) AS total_sum_powermonth
FROM calc;
`;
return msg;

name: PD
func:
msg.query = ` WITH calc AS (
        SELECT
          recorded_at::date AS day,
          
          CASE
            WHEN LAG(treatment_pond) OVER (ORDER BY recorded_at) IS NULL THEN 0
            WHEN treatment_pond >= LAG(treatment_pond) OVER (ORDER BY recorded_at)
              THEN treatment_pond - LAG(treatment_pond) OVER (ORDER BY recorded_at)
            ELSE treatment_pond + LAG(treatment_pond) OVER (ORDER BY recorded_at)
          END AS treatment_pond_calc,
          
          CASE
            WHEN LAG(wastewater_pump_building1) OVER (ORDER BY recorded_at) IS NULL THEN 0
            WHEN wastewater_pump_building1 >= LAG(wastewater_pump_building1) OVER (ORDER BY recorded_at)
              THEN wastewater_pump_building1 - LAG(wastewater_pump_building1) OVER (ORDER BY recorded_at)
            ELSE wastewater_pump_building1 + LAG(wastewater_pump_building1) OVER (ORDER BY recorded_at)
          END AS wastewater_pump_building1_calc,
          
          CASE
            WHEN LAG(wastewater_pump_building2) OVER (ORDER BY recorded_at) IS NULL THEN 0
            WHEN wastewater_pump_building2 >= LAG(wastewater_pump_building2) OVER (ORDER BY recorded_at)
              THEN wastewater_pump_building2 - LAG(wastewater_pump_building2) OVER (ORDER BY recorded_at)
            ELSE wastewater_pump_building2 + LAG(wastewater_pump_building2) OVER (ORDER BY recorded_at)
          END AS wastewater_pump_building2_calc
        FROM power_meters
        WHERE recorded_at::date BETWEEN CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '2 day' AND CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '1 day'
      )
      
      SELECT
        SUM(treatment_pond_calc + wastewater_pump_building1_calc + wastewater_pump_building2_calc) AS total_sum_poweryesterday
      FROM calc
      WHERE day = CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '1 day';`;
return msg;

name: WY
func:
msg.query = `
WITH combined AS (
  SELECT 
    w.recorded_at,
    w.water_in,
    w.water_out,
    b.air_cooling_water_building2,
    b.water_usage_building2,
    b.reused_treated_water,
    b.drinking_water,
    b.air_cooling_water_building1,
    b.water_usage_building1
  FROM water_meters w
  LEFT JOIN building_water_meters b
    ON DATE_TRUNC('minute', w.recorded_at) = DATE_TRUNC('minute', b.recorded_at)
  WHERE w.recorded_at >= date_trunc('year', CURRENT_DATE)
    AND w.recorded_at < (date_trunc('year', CURRENT_DATE) + INTERVAL '1 year')
),
calc AS (
  SELECT
    recorded_at,

    CASE
      WHEN LAG(water_in) OVER (ORDER BY recorded_at) IS NULL THEN 0
      WHEN water_in >= LAG(water_in) OVER (ORDER BY recorded_at)
        THEN water_in - LAG(water_in) OVER (ORDER BY recorded_at)
      ELSE water_in + LAG(water_in) OVER (ORDER BY recorded_at)
    END AS water_in_calc,

    CASE
      WHEN LAG(water_out) OVER (ORDER BY recorded_at) IS NULL THEN 0
      WHEN water_out >= LAG(water_out) OVER (ORDER BY recorded_at)
        THEN water_out - LAG(water_out) OVER (ORDER BY recorded_at)
      ELSE water_out + LAG(water_out) OVER (ORDER BY recorded_at)
    END AS water_out_calc,

    CASE
      WHEN LAG(water_usage_building1) OVER (ORDER BY recorded_at) IS NULL THEN 0
      WHEN water_usage_building1 >= LAG(water_usage_building1) OVER (ORDER BY recorded_at)
        THEN water_usage_building1 - LAG(water_usage_building1) OVER (ORDER BY recorded_at)
      ELSE water_usage_building1 + LAG(water_usage_building1) OVER (ORDER BY recorded_at)
    END AS building1_usage_calc,

    CASE
      WHEN LAG(water_usage_building2) OVER (ORDER BY recorded_at) IS NULL THEN 0
      WHEN water_usage_building2 >= LAG(water_usage_building2) OVER (ORDER BY recorded_at)
        THEN water_usage_building2 - LAG(water_usage_building2) OVER (ORDER BY recorded_at)
      ELSE water_usage_building2 + LAG(water_usage_building2) OVER (ORDER BY recorded_at)
    END AS building2_usage_calc

  FROM combined
)

SELECT
  SUM(water_in_calc + water_out_calc + building1_usage_calc + building2_usage_calc) AS total_sum_wateryear
FROM calc;
`;
return msg;

name: WM
func:
msg.query = `
WITH combined AS (
  SELECT 
    w.recorded_at,
    w.water_in,
    w.water_out,
    b.water_usage_building1,
    b.water_usage_building2
  FROM water_meters w
  LEFT JOIN building_water_meters b
    ON DATE_TRUNC('minute', w.recorded_at) = DATE_TRUNC('minute', b.recorded_at)
  WHERE w.recorded_at >= date_trunc('month', CURRENT_DATE)
    AND w.recorded_at < (date_trunc('month', CURRENT_DATE) + INTERVAL '1 month')
),
calc AS (
  SELECT
    recorded_at,

    CASE
      WHEN LAG(water_in) OVER (ORDER BY recorded_at) IS NULL THEN 0
      WHEN water_in >= LAG(water_in) OVER (ORDER BY recorded_at)
        THEN water_in - LAG(water_in) OVER (ORDER BY recorded_at)
      ELSE water_in + LAG(water_in) OVER (ORDER BY recorded_at)
    END AS water_in_calc,

    CASE
      WHEN LAG(water_out) OVER (ORDER BY recorded_at) IS NULL THEN 0
      WHEN water_out >= LAG(water_out) OVER (ORDER BY recorded_at)
        THEN water_out - LAG(water_out) OVER (ORDER BY recorded_at)
      ELSE water_out + LAG(water_out) OVER (ORDER BY recorded_at)
    END AS water_out_calc,

    CASE
      WHEN LAG(water_usage_building1) OVER (ORDER BY recorded_at) IS NULL THEN 0
      WHEN water_usage_building1 >= LAG(water_usage_building1) OVER (ORDER BY recorded_at)
        THEN water_usage_building1 - LAG(water_usage_building1) OVER (ORDER BY recorded_at)
      ELSE water_usage_building1 + LAG(water_usage_building1) OVER (ORDER BY recorded_at)
    END AS building1_usage_calc,

    CASE
      WHEN LAG(water_usage_building2) OVER (ORDER BY recorded_at) IS NULL THEN 0
      WHEN water_usage_building2 >= LAG(water_usage_building2) OVER (ORDER BY recorded_at)
        THEN water_usage_building2 - LAG(water_usage_building2) OVER (ORDER BY recorded_at)
      ELSE water_usage_building2 + LAG(water_usage_building2) OVER (ORDER BY recorded_at)
    END AS building2_usage_calc

  FROM combined
)

SELECT
  SUM(water_in_calc + water_out_calc + building1_usage_calc + building2_usage_calc) AS total_sum_watermonth
FROM calc;
`;
return msg;

name: WD
func:
msg.query = `
WITH last_values AS (
  SELECT
    DATE(recorded_at) AS date,
    MAX(recorded_at) AS max_time
  FROM water_meters
  WHERE recorded_at::date IN (CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '1 day', CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '2 day')
  GROUP BY DATE(recorded_at)
),
combined AS (
  SELECT
    w.recorded_at,
    w.water_in,
    w.water_out,
    b.water_usage_building1,
    b.water_usage_building2
  FROM water_meters w
  LEFT JOIN building_water_meters b
    ON DATE_TRUNC('minute', w.recorded_at) = DATE_TRUNC('minute', b.recorded_at)
  WHERE w.recorded_at IN (
    SELECT max_time FROM last_values
  )
),
diff AS (
  SELECT
    MAX(CASE WHEN DATE(recorded_at) = CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '2 day' THEN water_in END) AS water_in_day_before,
    MAX(CASE WHEN DATE(recorded_at) = CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '1 day' THEN water_in END) AS water_in_yesterday,

    MAX(CASE WHEN DATE(recorded_at) = CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '2 day' THEN water_out END) AS water_out_day_before,
    MAX(CASE WHEN DATE(recorded_at) = CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '1 day' THEN water_out END) AS water_out_yesterday,

    MAX(CASE WHEN DATE(recorded_at) = CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '2 day' THEN water_usage_building1 END) AS b1_day_before,
    MAX(CASE WHEN DATE(recorded_at) = CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '1 day' THEN water_usage_building1 END) AS b1_yesterday,

    MAX(CASE WHEN DATE(recorded_at) = CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '2 day' THEN water_usage_building2 END) AS b2_day_before,
    MAX(CASE WHEN DATE(recorded_at) = CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '1 day' THEN water_usage_building2 END) AS b2_yesterday
  FROM combined
)

SELECT
  ((water_in_yesterday - water_in_day_before)
   + (water_out_yesterday - water_out_day_before)
   + (b1_yesterday - b1_day_before)
   + (b2_yesterday - b2_day_before)
  ) AS total_sum_wateryesterday
FROM diff;
`;
return msg;
